 And do you have any questions ?~__False__
 No . But the contract stipulates that I will teach 22 hours a week.Will you have thatmany classes for me right away ?~__True__
 But my salary will be 1100 dollars a month.Will you pay me that much for the first month ? Because , I mean , I won't be working so many hours .~__True__
 I understand . That's why I didn't write the date on the contract.For the first two weeks , we will pay you according to the hours you teach.When you have 22 hours of classes , then the contract will take effect.Is that alright with you ?~__True__
 Oh , so I don't sign the contract today . Is that right ?~__True__
 I don't want you to misunderstand , Miss Briggs.We are very serious about hiring you . We want you to teach for us.We usually do contracts this way because it is more convenient .~__True__
 I can accept that .~__False__
 Good . And your benefits will begin immediately .~__False__
 Even my health insurance ?~__False__
 Yes . We will apply for your health insurance tomorrow.And your free membership in the club starts today if you like .~__True__
 I have a few questions about the free membership .~__False__
 What would you like to know ?~__False__
 Is my membership the same as paying club members ? I mean , can I get discounts at club hotels ?~__False__
 Absolutely . The only difference is in the restaurant and bar vouchers .~__False__
 What are bar vouchers ?~__False__
 Paying club members get around 300 dollars a year in restaurant vouchers.The vouchers can be used in the restaurant or the lounge.But we don't offer vouchers to employees .~__True__
 But according to the contract , employees get a discount in the restaurant .~__False__
 That's right . So in a way , it is cheaper for you than for the members.You get more benefits than they do .~__False__
 So , for now , you want me to keep a copy of the contract.But we won't sign it yet . That right ?~__False__
 Yes . I've prepared the contract just so that you understand everything.So that you understand the terms .~__False__
 I understand.And according to the terms on the contract , I am happy to accept this job . I look forward to it .~__False__
Outputs: I'm very pleased . We look forward to having you here , Miss Briggs .

 Yes .~__False__
